string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: A person trained by a human spaceflight program to command, pilot, or serve as a crew member of a spacecraft.
An artificial body placed in orbit round the earth or another planet in order to collect information or for communication.
A system of millions or billions of stars, together with gas and dust, held together by gravitational attraction.
A vehicle used for travelling or carrying things into space, which is shaped like a big tube.
